divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front porch with my two dogs facing the Big Dipper. I have limited view due to my porch roof. I saw a shooting star heading from south to north through the dipper. I then noticed a star by the upper handle side of the dipper bowl & thought "it's so clear that I could see a star that I didnt realize was there". Then I noticed it was moving. I stepped off my porch to see more sky. The object headed upward by the higher star that forms the dipper bowl & continued se toward Casseopeia. I thought it was a satellite but it was weaving slightly, somewhat changing direction & speed was not constant. I knew it was something different & was excited. It made a slight bend in a star cluster just nw of Casseopeia & went straight upward very quickly away from Earth - I was stunned! I look at the night sky all the time and have never seen anything like it. About 30 seconds after it was out of sight I saw a satellite heading very near the area where the object diappeared that was travelling from s to n. I then went to my back yard & continued to look at the n sky until about 2:30 am. I saw two more shooting stars in the n sky during that time. I believe in ETs & have been envious of those who have seen UFOs. As much as I look at the sky I've always thought I should see one.....now I have!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pataskala
There were no other sightings in Pataskala on or around July 13th 2009
Summary: Star-like object flew high across sky (not straight) & disappeared straight up.
